scripts.test: npx hardhat test test/domain/** test/access/** test/protocol/**.js test/protocol/clients/** --parallel
scripts.test:gas-reporter: npx hardhat test test/domain/** test/access/** test/protocol/**.js test/protocol/clients/**
scripts.check:scripts: eslint test/** scripts/** '*.js' && prettier --list-different test/** scripts/** '*.js'
scripts.docgen: npx truffle compile && npx solidoc && rm -rf build
scripts.tidy:scripts: eslint --fix test/** scripts/** '*.js' && prettier --write test/** scripts/** '*.js'
scripts.deploy-suite:test: npx hardhat run --network test scripts/deploy-suite.js  >> logs/test.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-suite:ethereum:mainnet: npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/deploy-suite.js >> logs/mainnet.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-suite:polygon:mumbai: npx hardhat run --network mumbai scripts/deploy-suite.js >> logs/mumbai.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-suite:polygon:mainnet: npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/deploy-suite.js >> logs/polygon.deploy.contracts.txt
scripts.verify-suite:ethereum:mainnet: npx hardhat verify-suite --network mainnet --chain-id 1 --env mainnet  >> logs/mainnet.verify.contracts.txt
scripts.verify-suite:polygon:mumbai-test: npx hardhat verify-suite --network mumbai --chain-id 80001 --env mumbai-test >> logs/mumbai-test.verify.contracts.txt
scripts.verify-suite:polygon:mumbai-staging: npx hardhat verify-suite --network mumbai --chain-id 80001 --env mumbai-staging >> logs/mumbai-staging.verify.contracts.txt
scripts.verify-suite:polygon:mainnet: npx hardhat verify-suite --network polygon --chain-id 137 --env polygon >> logs/polygon.verify.contracts.txt
scripts.deploy-mocks:hardhat: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat deploy-mock-nft-auth --network hardhat
scripts.deploy-mocks:local: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat deploy-mock-nft-auth --network localhost
scripts.deploy-mocks:test: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat deploy-mock-nft-auth --network test >> logs/test.deploy.mocks.txt
scripts.upgrade-facets:local: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/upgrade-facets.js
scripts.upgrade-facets:test: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network test scripts/upgrade-facets.js  >> logs/test.upgrade.contracts.txt
scripts.upgrade-facets:ethereum:mainnet: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network mainnet scripts/upgrade-facets.js >> logs/mainnet.upgrade.contracts.txt
scripts.upgrade-facets:polygon:mumbai: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network mumbai scripts/upgrade-facets.js >> logs/mumbai.upgrade.contracts.txt
scripts.upgrade-facets:polygon:mainnet: npx hardhat clean && npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat run --network polygon scripts/upgrade-facets.js >> logs/polygon.upgrade.contracts.txt
scripts.manage-roles:ethereum:mainnet: npx hardhat --network mainnet run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/mainnet.manage.roles.txt
scripts.manage-roles:polygon:mumbai: npx hardhat --network mumbai run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/mumbai.manage.roles.txt
scripts.manage-roles:polygon:mainnet: npx hardhat --network polygon run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/polygon.manage.roles.txt
scripts.manage-roles:local: npx hardhat --network localhost run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/localhost.manage.roles.txt
scripts.manage-roles:test: npx hardhat --network test run scripts/manage-roles.js >> logs/test.manage.roles.txt
